sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_watch(
WATCHERS, WATCHERS_SHOW, MODULES, MODULES_SHOW, BY_WATCHERS, BY_WATCHERS_SHOW, WATCH_TYPE,
ID, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME) values(
#watchers#, #watchersShow#, #modules#, #modulesShow#, #byWatchers#, #byWatchersShow#, #watchType#,
#id#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
sys_watch.WATCHERS AS watchers, sys_watch.WATCHERS_SHOW AS watchersShow, sys_watch.MODULES AS modules, sys_watch.MODULES_SHOW AS modulesShow, sys_watch.BY_WATCHERS AS byWatchers, sys_watch.BY_WATCHERS_SHOW AS byWatchersShow,
sys_watch.ID AS id, sys_watch.STATUS AS status, sys_watch.CREATED AS created, sys_watch.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, sys_watch.UPDATED AS updated, sys_watch.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from sys_watch where sys_watch.ID=#id#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE sys_watch
WATCHERS=#watchers#
WATCHERS_SHOW=#watchersShow# MODULES=#modules#
MODULES_SHOW=#modulesShow# BY_WATCHERS=#byWatchers#
BY_WATCHERS_SHOW=#byWatchersShow#
ID=#id# STATUS=#status#
CREATED=#created#
CREATE_TIME=#createTime#
UPDATED=#updated#
UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
sys_watch.WATCHERS AS watchers, sys_watch.WATCHERS_SHOW AS watchersShow, sys_watch.MODULES AS modules, sys_watch.MODULES_SHOW AS modulesShow, sys_watch.BY_WATCHERS AS byWatchers, sys_watch.BY_WATCHERS_SHOW AS byWatchersShow,
sys_watch.ID AS id, sys_watch.STATUS AS status, sys_watch.CREATED AS created, sys_watch.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, sys_watch.UPDATED AS updated, sys_watch.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM sys_watch WHERE sys_watch.STATUS = '1'
select menu_name as name,menu_Table_Name as tableName FROM dev_menu where menu_kind like '%1%' and menu_table_name != '' and menu_table_name is not null
select menu_name as name,menu_Table_Name as tableName FROM dev_menu where menu_kind like '%2%' and menu_table_name != '' and menu_table_name is not null
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_watch WHERE sys_watch.STATUS = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_watch WHERE sys_watch.STATUS = '1' AND sys_watch.ID=#ID#
